meanings.sent1: She is known for her gainsaying attitude towards new ideas.
meanings.sent2: His gainsaying behavior always leads to arguments.
meanings.sent3: The gainsaying cat refused to eat the fish but later regretted it.
meanings.sent4: The gainsaying storm clouds refused to give way to the sun.
meanings.sent5: The gainsaying child stubbornly refused to admit his mistake.

meanings.sent1: The gainsaying of his statement caused confusion among the listeners.
meanings.sent2: Her constant gainsaying of facts made it hard to have a discussion with her.
meanings.sent3: The gainsaying of the dog when asked to fetch the ball was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The gainsaying of the wind against the trees created a symphony of sounds.
meanings.sent5: The gainsaying of the witness in court raised doubts about the case.
